description: Number of partitions of n into parts not of form 4k+2, 16k, 16k+5 or 16k-5.
comments: Case k=4,i=3 of Gordon/Goellnitz/Andrews Theorem.Also number of partitions in which no odd part is repeated, with at most 2 parts of size less than or equal to 2 and where differences between parts at distance 3 are greater than 1 when the larger part is odd and greater than 2 when the larger part is even.Euler transform of period 16 sequence [1,0,1,1,0,0,1,1,1,0,0,1,1,0,1,0,...]. - _Michael Somos_, Jul 15 2004
references: G. E. Andrews, The Theory of Partitions, Addison-Wesley, 1976, p. 114.
